                      double kI,

        kP - Proportional constant
        kI - Integral constant
        kD - Derivative constant

      • setPodInverts

        public void setPodInverts(SwervePod.PodId podId,
                          boolean invertDrive,
                          boolean invertRotate)
        Configure motor inversions for the seleccted pod
        Parameters:
        podId - Swerve pod to configure
        invertDrive - Should this pod's drive motor be reversed?
        invertRotate - Should this pod's rotation motor be reversed?

      • getPodAngle

        public double getPodAngle(SwervePod.PodId podId)
        Returns the absolute angle of the selected pod, useful for SmartDashboard readouts
        Parameters:
        podId - Swerve pod to get the angle of
        Returns:
        Absolute angle [0,360] where 0 is the front of the robot
